Package: com.jcatalog.grailsflow.worklist

[Groovy] Class WorklistProvider

    • com.jcatalog.grailsflow.worklist.WorklistProvider

    • WorklistProvider class is used for getting nodes that are available for the specified authorities and where for all variables from variablesFilter (var.value is in variablesFilter.var.values).

      Authors:
      Stephan Albers
      July Karpey
